EmailTemplate.name: 18-02 See you tomorrow
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow, {!Contact.FirstName}!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We are looking forward to seeing you tomorrow night to drink beer & talk solar with BlueWave!
EVENT DETAILS:
WHERE: Captain Lawrence Brewery, 444 Saw Mill River Rd, Elmsford, NY WHEN: Tomorrow, Thursday, March 1st from 6-9PM. (We'll be there starting at4pm if you'd like to come early!) WHAT: Beer, wine, refreshments, a brewery tour, and talk of a solar future. WHY: BlueWave recently launched our solan loan in New York and we want to celebrate with you!
GETTING THERE: Please note, the Brewery is set back from the main road as shown on the map below. Self-parking and valet parking are both available upon arrival.
SAFETY FIRST: This event will have alcoholic (& non-alcoholic) beverages served. Please be sure you have a safe, sober ride home.
If you have any questions, please reach out to George Wissing, our New York Business Development Manager.
